last_episode_to_air.name: New York vs. LA
last_episode_to_air.overview: Andrea offers to host the memorial service for her great uncle and learns some surprising information about Jennifer's new boyfriend.

name: I'm Sorry
overview: Andrea is a seemingly confident comedy writer, wife and mom, who comically exposes her inner immaturity and neuroses through unexpected life situations.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Andrea discovers a titillating secret about another mom at her daughter's school that she can't quite get past, and later, Andrea plays phone tag with her doctor's office, causing everyone to wonder why the doctor is calling her on a Saturday.

episodes.name: Racist Daughter
episodes.overview: Andrea sets up a playdate with the new girl in Amelia's class and becomes horrified to learn that Amelia might be racist; when preparing for a dinner party for Mike's coworkers, Andrea contracts a painful medical condition.

episodes.name: Ass Cubes
episodes.overview: Andrea's friend Kyle is getting weirder with age, so she sets him up with Amelia's preschool teacher. Plus, Andrea's father starts hitting on her married mother.

episodes.name: Goddess Party
episodes.overview: When Andrea's recently divorced friend asks her to throw a Goddess Party, Andrea does her best to figure out exactly what that is. Plus, a mom at school hires an attractive nanny, and Andrea tries to convince her it's a terrible idea.

episodes.name: Acts of Service
episodes.overview: Andrea and Mike get self-help books and therapy to make sure their relationship stays on track; Andrea tries to juggle being a mom and a comedy writer.

episodes.name: Too Slow
episodes.overview: When Amelia has questions about different types of families, Andrea looks to expose her to new role models; suspecting that her brother is about to come out, Andrea tries to prepare her mother but is surprised by her reaction.

episodes.name: Divorce Fantasy
episodes.overview: Andrea pushes her divorced friend Jennifer back into dating so she can live vicariously through her, but ends up regretting their night out.

episodes.name: Butt Bumpers
episodes.overview: Andrea and Mike meet a new family they hope to befriend, but things become awkward during a playdate.

episodes.name: Weekend Alone
episodes.overview: With Mike away on business and Amelia at her mother's, Andrea finds herself home alone for the first time in years. Andrea laments that she doesn't get to hang out with her old friend group as much as she'd like.

episodes.name: Off the Charts
episodes.overview: Worried about getting older, Andrea and Mike check in on their fertility. Plus, Andrea confronts her father about his increasingly odd behavior.

episodes.name: Quietly Bleeding
episodes.overview: As Amelia begins kindergarten at a new school, Andrea and Mike learn what it's like to have other people influence her life. Plus, Andrea wonders how much she would make as a prostitute.

episodes.name: These Are My Fingers
episodes.overview: Andrea and Mike feel a little off in their relationship and struggle to get back on track. Plus, Andrea realizes that there's a downside to having a child who can read.

episodes.name: Barbara T. Warren
episodes.overview: The kids are given an unfortunate party favor, forcing Andrea and Mike to explain a major life lesson to Amelia. Later, Andrea learns that sometimes comedy bits can go too far...

episodes.name: Couple's Massage
episodes.overview: As the holidays approach, Andrea is stressed at work and agrees to get a massage to relax. Plus, Andrea and Mike try to teach Amelia the value of a dollar...

episodes.name: Extra Boobs
episodes.overview: Andrea learns she has a medical condition and decides to have surgery to correct it. Plus, Amelia's school project on her family tree leads to some new discoveries.

episodes.name: The Small of My Back
episodes.overview: Andrea learns that a teacher's aide at Amelia's school is being cheated on and debates whether to tell her. And, when Amelia spends the night at her grandfather's place, Andrea is forced to have an uncomfortable conversation.

episodes.name: Little Louse on the Prairie
episodes.overview: Andrea realizes she has to end a friendship that's gone on too long and a lice breakout at Amelia's school hits home.

episodes.name: Sophie's Choice
episodes.overview: Andrea tries to get her friend Jennifer to open up about her divorce, and Andrea and Mike explore new territory in their relationship.

episodes.name: Miss Diana Ross
episodes.overview: When Andrea's neighbor begins renting his house out on Airbnb, Andrea tries to avoid a confrontation; Andrea and Mike struggle to find a new babysitter.

episodes.name: New York vs. LA
episodes.overview: Andrea offers to host the memorial service for her great uncle and learns some surprising information about Jennifer's new boyfriend.
